title: DX Hold (Hold Monitor System) - ME
currentPhase: Final testing and user validation for FY25 will be completed, followed by full implementation and deployment of the FY25 version. Quick bug fixes and targeted improvements will also be addressed.

nextSteps.2025-12: Stage 2 of the DxHold Monitor system focuses on creating a systematic analysis to provide clearer, integrated insights. Visual improvements and enhanced information search will be implemented, along with evaluating new data-integration options from systems like ESSYM and AS400. Continuous data-update meetings will be maintained, and automatic escalation will be triggered for amounts exceeding $500,000.

timeline.currentPhase: Final testing and user validation for FY25 will be completed, followed by full implementation and deployment of the FY25 version. Quick bug fixes and targeted improvements will also be addressed.
